problems.title: Reverse Number Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a reverse number triangle pattern where each row starts from the row number and decreases to 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a reverse number triangle with N rows. Each row should print numbers from the row number down to 1.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
54321
4321
321
21
1

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
321
21
1
hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop from N down to 1, inner loop prints numbers from current row number down to 1.
